trans-unit.source: A trigger action that pauses a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma ação de gatilho que interrompe um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to pause a Storyboard.
trans-unit.target: Use um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> com um <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> ou <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> para pausar um Storyboard.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> only affects a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> when it is active (after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> starts).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> afeta somente uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> quando ele estiver ativo (depois que o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> é iniciado).

trans-unit.source: To control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> that controls that <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Para controlar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> deve fazer referência a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> que controla que <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for an example.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [como: usar gatilhos de eventos para controlar um Storyboard após iniciar](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) para obter um exemplo.
A partir de uma animação pausada

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action is triggered after it has been paused, it appears to resume and restart.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> ação é disparada depois que ele foi pausado, ele aparece para retomar e reinicie.

trans-unit.source: That's not what actually happens, however: the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action actually replaces itself with an unpaused version.
trans-unit.target: Que não é o que realmente acontece, no entanto: o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> ação substitui em si, na verdade, com uma versão de sair da pausa.

trans-unit.source: Each time a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action is triggered, clock objects are created for its storyboard.
trans-unit.target: Cada vez que um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> ação é disparada, relógio objetos são criados para o storyboard.

trans-unit.source: These clocks are distributed to the properties they animate.
trans-unit.target: Esses relógios são distribuídos para as propriedades que eles animam.

trans-unit.source: So, when a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is triggered again, it doesn't restart its clocks, it replaces them with new clocks.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, quando um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> é disparado novamente, ele não reiniciar seus relógios, ele substitui-los com os relógios dos novos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard" />.
